title: e-mail/box in/out
content: First you sk to donate, and I did, then you billed me, then you asked to donate again today so I did, now I download the latest and greatest for e-mail. I just hate the format, Infact I can't stand the inbox or out. Why could you not leave it like it was? I won't make the same mistake next year that's for sure.
creator: harvehudson
